title: A School Incident: Teacher Hurt by Student
summary: A 15-year-old boy at a school in Wales hurt a teacher with a weapon. The police came to the school after the attack. The teacher went to the hospital but is now home and recovering. The boy is in police custody and will go to court. The school closed for a day to help everyone feel safe. Leaders and a teachers' union said schools should be safe places without violence. This event shows how important it is to keep schools peaceful for learning.

background_read: This article talks about a serious event at a school where a student hurt a teacher. It helps us understand why safety in schools is important. Schools are places where children learn and teachers work, so everyone needs to feel secure. When something bad happens, police and leaders step in to help. This story shows how communities come together to support each other after tough times.
